title: thinking of quitting bugs non stop
body: ok i love this game so much but when it at the point where you click lock in in champ select grays out but dosent want to lock in in and makes you dodge really starting to get me mad. Worst part is that it keep happening to me only in rank

replies.body: Typically that's a sign that your network is having problems keeping a solid connection with our servers for some reason. Sometimes you just need to update your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), other times it's caused by packet loss. Let me know if adjusting those settings helps, and if not we can test for packet loss.
